name: Rickshaw Hero
description:
In Rickshaw Hero, you play as an intrepid driver trying to brave the hazards of peak hour traffic. Live out every rickshaw driver's fantasy as you pull off Bollywood-worthy dodges and showcase your three-wheeled prowess. Establish your dominance as the true master of the streets.

Features:

  • Control a speeding autorickshaw in the oncoming lane!
  • Three kinds of vehicles to overcome!
  • Mindless pedestrians to crush beneath your wheels!
  • Hazardous ruts and street vendors!
  • Three different powerups: Score, life, and INVINCIBILITY!

Gameplay:
